Bought this to replace an old first gen Watt Bike which had become a little tired and outdated due it to not being "smart"!
Although the Wahoo Kickr bike is an extravagance it is such a quality training machine. The smart features and incline alteration are a revelation. Pleasantly quiet in operation.
Straightforward to set up and the Wahoo training app is very comprehensive and engaging.

reviews.content:
Ordered a reconditioned bike and it arrived DOA. I was disappointed because the return process was a huge inconvenience. I had to disassemble a portion of the bike and take it to FedEx in two boxes that were shipped to me by Wahoo. It was heavy and cumbersome and barely fit in my suv. The replacement bike came a week later. It was like new or likely brand new. The bike has been flawless and a joy to ride. I'm coming from a Kickr V5 and this bike improves the experience tremendously. 

I wish I didn't have the initial broken bike but now that I'm all set up with the replacement...its been great!
reviews.title: Great Bike when it works...Wahoo Customer Service A++

reviews.content: I was reluctant to purchase a Kickr bike for the longest time because I had heard of issues when it first came out. When I saw it go on sale in the summer I had a feeling that a new version was about to be announced. It was! But it was also $500 more. I hesitated but finally succumb to buying it. I ride on Zwift several thousand miles a year and maybe all the issues were resolved. Well, it is a GREAT bike. I have it connected by ethernet to my network and it just works. The bike is very smooth and while it took me at least 4 rides to get my position correct after that I love to get on it. It is solid as a rock and I can change the gearing to whatever I want it to be. My only gripe was that I had to re-wrap the bars with better tape.
reviews.title: Highly recommended

reviews.content: I am extremely pleased with riding my New Kickr Bike. I have had it for nearly two weeks and feel that my experience riding on Zwift is even more “real”. The ride is very smooth, quiet, and the grade simulation changes truly add to the experience. The power changes in structured workouts are smooth and feel more authentic. Shifting is smooth and just like my road bike. It took me several hours to build and set up the bike and required assistance by two patient helpers. My only complaint is that I could use more height on the handlebars. This is a pricey piece of equipment, but for me, it’s worth the cost.
reviews.title: Excellent riding experience

I couldn't connect to WiFi for a day or two, but haven't had any issues since then. It took a few days of riding for my back to strengthen and get used to the position that is "optimal". I ride it nearly every day. If you want to make an investment in your cycling fitness and have the resources, I highly recommend this bike.

reviews.content:
I've been a Kickr Trainer user for seven years. As the trainers got better, and added features, I purchased the new versions. When Climb was introduced I was an early adopter. I've been on Zwift since we rode with ghost riders because there were so few on the platform. The bottom line isvthat I have a lot of experience with Wahoo haven ridden over 50K kilometers on the platforms. 

When the Kickr Bike was introduced I was a little skeptical. A lot of money for the same thing I do on my bike. I held off buying one. Last month I decided to go for it. I'm totally impressed. Ultra sturdy, well engineered and a marvel of design. Adjustable in every way down to a fraction of a millimeter. Clean operation with no chain oil or debris created by cassette and chain wear. Well thought out in every way. I live in a location with real, very long winters and without my indoor setup I'd go crazy. I'm very satisfied and as I use it more I'll update my review.
reviews.title: The Best Kit Available For Indoor Training

trainer.sentence: As the trainers got better, and added features, I purchased the new versions.

reviews.content:
I am thoroughly impressed with the bike. The onboarding process was simple and straightforward. The app is a marvel of design. The bike is sturdy, the shifting is intuitive, and the features are an indoor specialist's dream.

My one criticism is that the bike made a loud and annoying creaking sound with out-of-saddle efforts. After a bit of research and troubleshooting, I discovered that copious amounts of grease on the stand over height adjustment solved the problem.

Thank you for making a solid product for those of us that enjoy riding virtually.

reviews.content: As I have ms (multiple sclerosis) I can no longer ride a cycle on the road as its to dangerous for myself and others around me. When I looked into a trainer this ticked all the boxes for me, its amazing it still feels like a road bike and I can keep my fitness up and still enjoy the thrill it gives me. Best bits for me are choosing your gears set up to your exact set up on your road bike and it really feels like your on your road bike.

reviews.content: I am extremely happy with my KICKR BIKE. Very easy to assemble out of the box, and adjust it, to your road bike measurements. I subscribed to Wahoo X, and the KICKR BIKE performs as close to being out on the road. The difference is very, very minimal. It has all the latest technology, integrated. I had to buy the HRM strap separately, to make it complete. So far, it’s the best home trainer that I have tried, that’s out in the market. My wife loves it too. She is not a bike enthusiast, as I am, but KICKR BIKE is turning her into one😁
reviews.title: Just like being on the Road

reviews.content: Love this bike. I have been a Wahooligan for some time. Had the 2018 Kickr with a climb. But having to take the bike off and on, and the noise it made was difficult with a new born and toddler. The bike is quiet, and very comfortable and easy to change from person to person. There have been some issues from other people with the seat clamp, I have not personally had this issue but will be on the look out. Definitely worth it… look for discounts as I got mine 900 dollars off from Wahoo.

reviews.content: The Wahoo KickR bike is a great investment for serious road cyclists. Its integration with online apps is fabulous and simple to implement. The ride feel of the bike is amazing - all made possible by the ability to accurately adjust the KickR bike to mirror your road bike dimensions and fit, manage cog/cassettes, select specific shifting styles, and the ability of the bike to accurately change front/rear tilt to mirror the % grade changes in the roads in real-time. While a bit pricey, the savings on the wear and tear of your road bike are worth the investment.
reviews.title: Wahoo KickR bike is worth the investment

reviews.content: Can’t speak more highly about the Kickr Bike. Love the gearing options - I’ve set mine up as eTap 11 speed to match my road bike. The automatic incline feature adds another dimension of realism as well as the flywheel continuing to spin while you are coasting.
